question: Which items are below their reorder level?
sql_template: SELECT TOP %{{count}}% si.StockItemName, sih.QuantityOnHand, sih.ReorderLevel, sih.TargetStockLevel, sih.BinLocation, (sih.ReorderLevel - sih.QuantityOnHand) AS QuantityBelowReorder FROM Warehouse.StockItems si JOIN Warehouse.StockItemHoldings sih ON si.StockItemID = sih.StockItemID WHERE sih.QuantityOnHand <= sih.ReorderLevel ORDER BY QuantityBelowReorder %{{order}}%
reasoning: Identifies stock items where current quantity on hand has fallen at or below the reorder level. Orders by how far below reorder level they are (worst first by default). Critical for inventory replenishment planning.
